item.description:
The Hide Away
@ Anthony's
105 Canal St
Malden, MA 02148

Every Saturday Night is Ladies Night: (10 min from Boston)

Come and enjoy a night of dancing and a chance to meet some very nice women.

DJ Tracy will be mixing her R&B, Latin and top 40 fabulous music all night long till 1:30 am.

We also have The New Possibilities performing from 8:30 - 9:30 pm for their C.D. Release party.

Any questions e-mail: BlushBoston@yahoo.com or call 617 877 1808.

• ATM
• Hi-Def TV (Sports Channels)
• Fire Place
• Premium Liquor
• (FREE FOOD)
• 2 Parking Lots (FREE)
• $7.00 Cover charge
• Hours 8:00 p.m. to 1:30 a.m.
• 5 minute WALK from Malden T-Station
[/color=blue]
item.name: Every Saturday is Ladies Night
